text:
It would be useful to have documentation about the output produced by ab. For eg

Does
  Total transferred:      5210316800 bytes
refer to HTTP bytes or IP bytes?

It is not clear how
  Time per request:       4887.117 [ms] (mean)
is calculated

Once again what does
  Transfer rate:          10411.46 [Kbytes/sec] received
correspond to? IP transfer rate? HTTP transfer rate? HTTP payload transfer rate?
creator: kurienmatheww@gmail.com
humbedooh@apache.org
text: Closing this ticket as the questions are now answered in the documentation.
